item.author: suofeiyaxx@gmail.com (AGou-ops)
item.description:
çœ‹ä¼¼ç®€å•ï¼Œå…¶å®ä¸­é—´æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šå‘ï¼Œæœ‰æ—¶å€™ä¸€ä¸ªå°å°çš„é”™è¯¯å°±ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ä¸€è¿ä¸²çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ•…åœ¨æ­¤è®°å½•ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

é¢„å…ˆå‡†å¤‡

é…ç½®Harbor https

ç”ŸæˆCAè‡ªç­¾è¯ä¹¦ã€ç§é’¥ã€haborè¯ä¹¦ç§é’¥ï¼ˆharbor.xxx.localæ¢æˆä½ è‡ªå·±çš„åŸŸåï¼‰ï¼š

# CAç§é’¥
openssl genrsa -out ca.key 4096
# CAè¯ä¹¦
openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -sha512 -days 3650 \
 -subj "/C=CN/ST=Beijing/L=Beijing/O=example/OU=Personal/CN=harbor.xxx.local" \
 -key ca.key \
 -out ca.crt
# ç”Ÿæˆhaborç§é’¥
openssl genrsa -out harbor.key 4096
# ç”Ÿæˆè¯ä¹¦è¯·æ±‚æ–‡ä»¶
openssl req -sha512 -new \
 -subj "/C=CN/ST=Beijing/L=Beijing/O=example/OU=Personal/CN=yourdomain.com" \
 -key harbor.key \
 -out harbor.csr
# ç”Ÿæˆx509 v3æ ¼å¼çš„æ–‡ä»¶
cat > v3.ext <<-EOF
authorityKeyIdentifier=keyid,issuer
basicConstraints=CA:FALSE
keyUsage = digitalSignature, nonRepudiation, keyEncipherment, dataEncipherment
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[alt_names]
DNS.1=harbor.xxx.local
DNS.2=harbor.xxx
EOF
# ä½¿ç”¨ä¸Šé¢çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ¥ç­¾ç½²è¯ä¹¦
openssl x509 -req -sha512 -days 3650 \
 -extfile v3.ext \
 -CA ca.crt -CAkey ca.key -CAcreateserial \
 -in harbor.csr \
 -out harbor.crt
